html.body:
Last modification: November 23, 2016


Thank you for using “WiFi Authority”.

By using “WiFi Authority” the user agrees with the following terms:

1. Mobile applications, like any other piece of software are prone to fails, bugs, crashes, data losses and other malfunctions. The operating system and the hardware on which it is running are prone to the same problems. So, mohb apps is not responsible for any consequences of such malfunctions, use this application at your own risk. 

2. The maps service is provided by “Google Maps TM” API, so mohb apps is not responsible for any malfunctions that can occur with it and any consequences of it.

3. These terms are subjected to changes. In this case, the user will be notified in the application page on “Google Play Store TM” when a new version of the app has been released and by continuing using the application the user automatically agrees with the new terms. 



“Google MapsTM” and “Google Play Store TM” are trademarks of Google, Inc.

mohb apps does not have any partnership or any other form of relation with Google, Inc.

Last modification: November 23, 2016


Thank you for using “WiFi Authority”

Through this document, mohb apps guarantee that “WiFi Authority” does not collect any user's personal data necessary to the proper operation of the application, including current location. These data are stored only on local storage of the user's device and it is not sent in any way to mohb apps. If the user uninstall the app, all this data is permanently deleted. “WiFi Authority” also does not collect any other user's personal data, including phone identity, contacts, files, installed applications or any other data that can identify the user. The internet connection is used only by the purpose of get the maps, get address information of the locations, get Legal Notices, get Help pages and send feedback e-mails.

This document is subjected to changes. In this case, the user will be notified in the application page on “Google Play Store TM” when a new version of the app have been released.



“Google Play Store TM” is a trademark of Google, Inc.

resources.string: The wifi signal representation in the application icon and the icons inside the application were designed by Google, Inc. under the “material design guidelines“ and used and modified according to Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (CC-BY 4.0).
